350 characters doesnt do this professor justice. Most inspirational, caring professor I have ever had the pleasure of taking. Do yourself a favor and take him if you have the opportunity, you will not regret it.

This guy is amazing. It is a class that because it isn't difficult, gives you more time to focus on learning and figuring out your path in your future career. Professor Taylor is a great mentor and cares about his students so much. Take him if you can!

comment: He only cares that people understand the subject. He has a lot of experience so he knows what he's talking about. Makes it a point to know your name. He is willing to help. Brad Taylor was easily one of my top favorite professors at Kennesaw State. He is passionate about what he teaches and engages the class in his lectures. Professor Taylor genuinely cares about his students and their success and understanding.

Taylor is retired from The Coca Cola Factory. He knows what he's talking about and brings a lot of real life experience into his lectures. The group project is required from the school's curriculum, but he does his best to make it manageable. Great teacher, listens to his students, and wants to see us succeed. 5/5 would take again.
